name: SE NNEGC Energoatom
membership: Energoatom is an active member of Foratom, of WANO the World Association of Nuclear Operators and the International IAEA the International Atomic Energy Agency
goal: Generation of power through nuclear, hydro and other engineering production; maintenance of power generating plants and operation of power generation plants. Research and development into the energy sector.
euInitiatives: Climate change, Carbon emissions reduction, Renewable Energy, Energy Policy, Energy Security Policy, Energy Security and Nuclear safety.
